ComicInfo.Title: Daddy Issues
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ash is neck-deep in family drama when Dr. Talisha is discovered dead of an apparent vampire attack, leading to an angry confrontation between Eva, the Daughter of Dracula, and her estranged father. Can the delicate truce between the humans and their monstrous protectors withstand such bloodshed and betrayal â€“ or is this truly the end for them all?
